content: this is the ad-free pdf version of the free pattern found on my website this light blanket is an easy 4 row repeat with a lovely texture provided with the puff as well as bpdc ridges filet row provide a light airy feeling blanket is square and could easily be made into any size just by adjusting the number of rounds made with the self-striping lion brand cupcake yarn for ease of color work beginner friendly and with an to memorize stitch pattern so you can while away your evening listening to your favorite audiobook
